text: was a Japanese politician. He became the governor of Fukuoka Prefecture in 2011. In 2015, he was re-elected for a second termHiroshi Ogawa reelected as Governor of Fukuoka, Fukuoka Now, 15 April 2015. and for a third term in 2019. Ogawa was born in Fukuoka, Japan. In September 2021, Ogawa resigned after being diagnosed with terminal lung cancer. He died from the disease on 2 November 2021 in Fukuoka, aged 72. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Fukuoka Prefecture
title: Hiroshi Ogawa (politician)
